generalInfo:
Come with us on an expedition to CÃ´te d'Ivoire, a country full of magic, where rituals and dance are the link between the world of people and spirits.

During your trip you will see many unusual dances, some of them included on the UNESCO cultural heritage list. You will visit authentic villages of the Fulani and Senufo peoples, where Picasso himself drew inspiration for his artistic work.

There will be contacts with local artists, weavers, sculptors, and you will also see how shea butter is made. You will try local dishes and tropical fruit.

You will also visit cities where you will be able to admire ancient mud mosques typical of West Africa.

We invite you on an extraordinary journey to a country where you can enjoy the best chocolate in the world and admire the wonders of nature and culture.

dayInfo.description: Wednesday Upon arrival at the airport in Abidjan, your guide is there to welcome you and accompany you to the hotel. Dinner and overnight stay at the hotel Sun Set"".

Thursday ABIDJAN To YAMOUSSOUKRO Morning departure from Abidjan to Yamoussoukro in private car about 3 hours drive, We will pass by beautiful villages, passing the Bananas plaintation. Lunch in Yamoussoukoro. bref stop at the hotel to leave ahours laguage, Then visit on the afternoon the Basilica Felix Houphouet Boigny, river of crocodiles, the Mosque; Dinner and overnight at the hotel Royale""" 3 stars

FRIDAY: YAMOUSSOUKRO - DANCE OF ZAOULI - DALOA- MAN Morning departure to Bouafle about 1 hour drive for the Zaouli traditional dance then to Daloa Stop for lunch in Daloa then visit of the Fabrication of Palm Oile and WIne where you have a chance to try to Local palm Wine. We continue our route between Cacao plantations to rich Man in the afternoon. Dinner and Overnight at the hotel Beau Sejour""" 3 stars or similar

SATURDAY: MAN Morning trekking on the forest for about 4 hours both ways to see the Cascade and the montagne of ( LA DENT DE MAN ) Brek for lunch then we continue our city tour with the local guide: : visit of the Artisan market, tradional local medecine market and the Sacre Monkey forest on the middle of the city. Dinner and Overnight at the hotel Beau Sejour """ 3 stars in Man or similar

SUNDAY: MAN - ODIENNE YACOUBA DANCE (ECHASSIERS) Morning after breakfast departure to Yacouba very authentic village for very tradional dance , we will passe more Cacao, Fromagier trees and Coffe plaintation You will even have the chance to participed in the dance with villagious, We continue our route to Odienne lunch on the way, arrive in the afternoon, Visit with a local guide to see the DONSO Hunter and they traditions medecine, the old Mosque of Odienne. Dinner and Overnight at the hotel le Frontiere.

MONDAY: ODIENNE to KORHOGO Morning departure in our private car to Korhogo about 4h drive Stop on the way to visit Niofoun very old and the interesting Senoufo animist village, then to Korhogo Pic-nique on the route, Arrive in the afternoon and lazy time on hotel by the swimming pool. Dinner and Overnight at the hotel Olympe """ 3 stars.

TUESDAY: KORHOGO Morning visit the city, Local artisans, The hand made weaving fabrics, The hand made Wood sculptures the women shea butter factory, all day exploring the city Free afternoon Dinner in local restaurant with some music and overnight stay at the hotel in Korhogo in Olympe.

WEDNESDAY: KORHOGO -KONG Morning departure in private car to Kong City to visit the very old Mad Mosque from the 11 century. On the way we will stop to visit very authentic Fulani village with they tradition, Passing the Mangoes and gigantes Baobab tree. lunch on the route then back to Korhogo . Dinner and Overnight at the hotel Olympe in Korhogo.

THURSDAY: KORHOGO - BOUAKE Morning departure in private car to Bouake about 5hours drive We will passe very interessing Fullani, Senoufo villages and many differents plantation. Arrive on the afternoon in Bouake. Lazy afternoon by swimming pool. Dinner on the restaurant and overnight in Hotel des Arts in Bouake.

FRIDAY: BOUAKE TO GRAND BASSAM Morning drive in private car about 4 hours to Grand Bassam which is located on the coast of Gulf of Guinea, Lunch in the route or in Grand Bassam We will arrive some time in the afternoon, Lazy afternoon by the swimming pool. Dinner and overnight stay at hotelWharf or similar. by the beach.

SATURDAY: GRAND BASSAM AND BEACH Morning city tour with a local guide ; the Old city, the very local artisan market and museum, the fisher Men village, see how they make the smok Fish. lunch by the beach and lazy afternoon on the beach, END OF THE TOUR We transfer you to the airport with the help of your guide.
